             files="com.azure.cosmos.ClientSideRequestStatistics"/> <!-- Need OperatingSystemMXBean from sun to obtain cpu info -->

+  <suppress checks="com.azure.tools.checkstyle.checks.EnforceFinalFieldsCheck" files="com.azure.management.resources.fluentcore.arm.ResourceId"/>

nodes.bodyText: The EnforceFinalFieldsCheck has already showed, "You should consider making the field final, or suppressing the warning". This is because the parameters in ResourceId are not simply set. When uses final, it will lead to compile error like variable subscriptionId might be assigned in loop. I'm not sure whether we need give reason, since so much suppression here without reason and it only affects our own code.

nodes.bodyText: I think you need to check length for each of these? Maybe this.subscriptionId = splits.length > 1 ? splits[1] : null
I'll fix it. I just take them out of switch..case.
test is still there. If we plan to fix them, just leave to our local.
